content:
In STU3 Immunization we want to use doseNumberString from R4 Immunization.
According to Versions this is possible, and I can create instances using this approach that are accepted by the IGPublisher.

We want to put a must support flag on the use of this pre-adoption, and that is causing me problems.
When I try to include the extension in the structure definition I get an error that the extension does not resolve.

Is this a problem with my approach?
Is this a problem with the validator?
I don't think that the snapshot generator knows about those extensions yet

Is the snapshot generating being updated as people get interested in these extensions?
Any estimate on when I could use this approach?
Should I just define an extension?
I'm not sure what the timeline would be. In the next few weks?
I suspect that before Christmas will be fine. I'm having trouble getting useful dates.
I now suspect that we'll need it before 24 October. :oh_no:
